name: Dharma Rebecca Funder

jv_history.partner_name: #045 Rebecca Nicholson: where did my worries go?
jv_history.source_quote: 5D World — about healing in a group ... night...?Rebecca Nicholson Rebecca Nicholson is the CEO of 5D World and Founding partner of 5D Vent

what_you_do: Dharma Funder installs operating systems that preserve decision access and authority under load, so leaders stop relying on urgency, over-functioning, and force to keep things moving.
who_you_serve: People who carry real responsibility. Revenue, people, compliance, and reputation sit on their decisions.
business_focus: Dharma Funder installs operating systems that preserve decision access and authority under load for leaders.
service_provided: structural leadership advisory, nervous system regulation, clear authority, decision architecture
